# Initialize repository with required data for testing : 
# owl:propertyChainAxiom, Scenario 2 (prp-spo2) 

PREFIX bbc:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/bbc/>  
PREFIX rdf:<http://www.w3.org/1999/02/22-rdf-syntax-ns#> 
PREFIX owl:<http://www.w3.org/2002/07/owl#> 
PREFIX rdfs:<http://www.w3.org/2000/01/rdf-schema#> 
PREFIX xsd:<http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema#> 
PREFIX core:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/coreconcepts/> 
PREFIX cwork:<http://www.bbc.co.uk/ontologies/creativework/> 
PREFIX ldbc:<http://www.ldbc.eu/ontologies/sempub#>

INSERT DATA {
  <http://www.bbc.co.uk/things/creativework-prp-spo2-2#id> a cwork:NewsItem ;
    cwork:title "Test for owl:propertyChainAxiom (prp-spo2) - owl:ObjectProperty " ;
    cwork:thumbnail <http://www.bbc.co.uk/thumbnail/creativework-prp-spo2-2-thumbnail> .

    <http://www.bbc.co.uk/thumbnail/creativework-prp-spo2-2-thumbnail> cwork:thumbnailType cwork:CloseUpThumbnail .
}
